content: > join the sweet bee crochet facebook > group you are welcome to share your > project photos links to your > favourite patterns and connect with > others in an encouraging and positive > environment click here 1 this keyhole scarf is designed to stay in place with your preference of a snug or loose fit tuck it comfortably into your jacket or wear it overtop to display the pretty lattice design at the ends this scarf is made with bernat satin yarn which creates a lovely drape displaying the slant of the herringbone half_double_crochet stitches in beautiful way the finished scarf measures approximately 7 1/2 inches wide and 43 1/2 inches long **materials needed ** - approximately 313 yards of worsted weight yarn i used bernat satin - 5mm hook or appropriate hook required to match gauge - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions written in us terms - special stitch tutorials with direct links for detailed walk throughs - clear photos - required tools gauge approximate yardage required ***this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products *** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
